Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.controller

Class EndGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.controller.ControllerState
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.controller.EndGameState
public class EndGameState extends ControllerState
Represents the state of the game when it has ended. This state handles the necessary finalization tasks such as calculating the points gathered from the objectives and declaring the winner.

  • Constructor Details

    • EndGameState

      public EndGameState(Game game, RmiServer rmiServer, SocketServer socketServer)
      Constructs an EndGameState with the specified game, RMI server, and socket server. This constructor calls methods to finalize the match and declare the winner.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance that this state is associated with.
      rmiServer - The RMI server used for remote method invocation.
      socketServer - The socket server used for socket communication.
